risks.title: Flood risk
risks.rationale: Campbelltown lies near River Torrens, but property not on known floodplain based on suburb description.
what_to_check: Consult Council flood maps or state planning atlas for precise overlay

risks.title: Bushfire risk
risks.rationale: Inner suburban location with minimal vegetative fuel; low risk by typical standards.
what_to_check: Refer to South Australia bushfire overlay via Planning and Design Code

risks.title: Heritage overlay risk
risks.rationale: No heritage listing indicated; modern (2015) construction.
what_to_check: Verify via Council heritage register or SA Property and Planning Atlas

risks.title: Internet connectivity uncertainty
risks.rationale: Public sources do not specify NBN technology; could affect future upgrades or speeds.
what_to_check: Check NBN Co rollout map or contact NBN Co with address
